meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robin Falco Tyler Lee James Holzhauer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7980.

td.p: Robin Falco, a nonprofit administrator from King of Prussia, Pennsylvania
Tyler Lee, an international banking project manager from Hollis, New York
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 16-day cash winnings total $1,225,987)

tr.td: CRAZY WEATHER WE'RE HAVING!
PLAYERS ON THE CHAMPIONSHIP TEAM
(Alex: You have to identify the team; we'll give the players to you.)
IT'S A GAS
GREEK CUISINE
1930s SLANG
THE PLAY'S THE THING
(Alex: And we want you to name the play for us.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Tyler: Who are the Red Sox?)

the Cubbies (or the Chicago Cubs)

JamesTyler
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
